I was working on sending my JUnit tests results from a suite of SOA soap
service tests over to Mercury QualityCenter, as QC seems a central
repository for test cases and test results (at least where I am working
now).

I have always just used the base JUnit reporting, but am now messing
around with XSL stylesheets to change the results XML into a format
suitable for  QC.   I am still working on this...and I am new at
XSL...but I thought I'd share the approach for what it is worth...(which
may not be much)....as it seems possibly generically useful thing for
some people to want to perhaps do as well.

JUnit Results -------> Mercury QC
<http://michael01612.spaces.live.com/blog/cns!2D894EF96C8FC0!2168.entry>

Mike Foley
